ExtUtils::MM_OS2(3pm) Perl Programmers Reference Guide ExtUtils::MM_OS2(3pm)

NAME

ExtUtils::MM_OS2 - methods to override UN*X behaviour in ExtUtils::MakeMaker

SYNOPSIS

 use ExtUtils::MM_OS2; # Done internally by ExtUtils::MakeMaker if needed

DESCRIPTION

See ExtUtils::MM_Unix for a documentation of the methods provided there. This package overrides the implementation of these methods, not the semantics.

METHODS

init_dist
Define TO_UNIX to convert OS2 linefeeds to Unix style.
init_linker
os_flavor
OS/2 is OS/2
xs_static_lib_is_xs
2021-05-04 perl v5.34.0
